body: I was asking something slightly different, sorry for not being clear.  How do you know you found all the places where we need to guard?  Why isn't there a single place we need to guard?  E.g. move at::getVariableType to torch::getVariableType and make sure that's the only way we can get an (uninitialized) VariableType and guard only that (don't take the specific suggestion too seriously, just trying to get the point across).
